therapyGoals.title: Therapy Goals
therapyGoals.setGoalDescription: Set therapy goals to give direction and motivation to your healing journey.

prompts.visionReflection:
I see that you've created a beautiful vision of your future self. You described your future self as embodying qualities like: {{qualities}}. Your vision was: "{{description}}"

I'd love to explore this vision with you. What aspects of this future self feel most inspiring to you right now? And what small step could you take today to embody a little more of these qualities?
prompts.strengthReflection:
I noticed from your memory insights that you have some strengths and positive patterns. Let's take a moment to reflect on these strengths: "{{content}}"

What do you think makes these strengths particularly meaningful to you? How might you lean into these strengths more in your daily life?
prompts.emotionReflection:
I see that you have some deep emotional insights from our conversations: "{{content}}"

Sometimes it's valuable to spend time with our emotions and understand what they're telling us. What emotions come up for you when you read this insight? What might these emotions be trying to communicate to you?

emptyStates.chatWithAnu: Chat with Anu or track your mood after exercises to see personalized insights here

explanations.allOrNothing: Seeing things in black and white without middle ground
explanations.overgeneralization: Making broad conclusions from single events
explanations.mindReading: Assuming you know what others think
explanations.shouldStatements: Using rigid rules about how things should be
explanations.labeling: Attaching negative labels to yourself or others
explanations.personalization: Blaming yourself for things outside your control
explanations.thoughtPattern: A recurring way of thinking that may need attention

patterns.presentationThought: I completely messed up that presentation, I'm terrible at public speaking
patterns.presentationReframe: The presentation had some rough spots, but I also had good moments. I'm learning and improving.
patterns.presentationContext: Identified during conversation about work stress
patterns.jobThought: If I don't get this job, my career will be ruined
patterns.jobReframe: Not getting this particular job would be disappointing, but there are other opportunities out there.

journey.nextSuggestion: Try a Reframe to reduce worry
